hero.title: Homemade Meals
hero.subtitle: PanPlans lets you have fun in the kitchen again by freeing your mental space. Let the app plan your weekly meals and organise your shopping list - all while respecting your dietary needs and preferences.

mealPlanning.title: Smart Meal Planning
mealPlanning.description: Get personalized meal recipes based on your preferences, dietary restrictions, and what's already in your pantry.

shopping.title: Smart Shopping List
shopping.description: Automatically generate shopping lists based on your weekly meal plans. Buy only what you need.

allergies.title: Allergy Safe
allergies.description: Set your dietary restrictions and allergies. PanPlans ensures every recipe suggestion is safe for you.

pantry.title: Pantry Management
pantry.description: Track your ingredients and never let food go to waste again.

nutrition.title: Nutrition Tracking
nutrition.description: Keep track of your nutritional intake with detailed breakdowns for every meal.

mcpAccess.title: MCP Access
mcpAccess.description: Connect PanPlans to your AI assistant for seamless meal planning integration.

appPreview.title: Experience
appPreview.description: A beautifully and minimalistic designed app that makes meal planning a joy.

download.title: Ready to Get Started?
download.subtitle: Download PanPlans today and transform the way you plan, cook, and eat.
